summary: Expert estimator with 15+ years in civil projects, delivering precise cost assessments that optimized budgets by up to 20%.

bullets.text: Conducted comprehensive analysis of tendering documents and provided cost estimates using first principle methods, ensuring a high degree of accuracy in project budgeting, reducing costs by 15%.

Prepared and detailed Bills of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents for diverse civil projects including foundations, structural, architectural, and MEP services, improving project efficiency by 10%.
Executed detailed cost estimations and consultations, assessing supplier quotations, especially in MEP installations, and negotiating favorable terms, saving 12% on procurement costs.
Managed and finalized detailed BOQs and final accounts, consistently ensuring alignment with initial budgeting and achieving client satisfaction, with a 95% satisfaction rate.
Developed initial program schedules to facilitate project timelines and budget adherence, contributing to reduced project overruns by 20%.

Successfully completed award-winning projects, including multiple large-scale religious and educational complexes, handling detailed material take-offs and cost estimates, contributing to a 15% increase in project awards.
Oversaw project documentation for residential project approvals and regularizations, streamlining compliance with regulatory standards, reducing approval time by 25%.
Executed tender analysis and preliminary budgeting, transforming draft drawings into comprehensive cost outlines for TOC submission, reducing initial cost estimates by 8%.
Produced BOQs encompassing materials, labour, plant, and equipment, integral to competitive bidding and project execution, increasing bid success rate by 10%.
Managed cost consulting with suppliers, negotiating pricing that maintained budget targets amidst fluctuating market costs, achieving a 7% cost reduction.
Drafted comprehensive commercial submission documents, incorporating assumptions, exclusions, and precise pricing schedules, enhancing document accuracy by 15%.
Clarified and optimized project scope, working closely with contractors and builders to propose cost-effective construction methodologies, reducing construction costs by 12%.

Handled multiple high-stakes infrastructure projects, from terminal stations to level crossing removals, ensuring thorough attention to cost and scheduling, achieving a 20% improvement in project delivery times.
Streamlined project cost adjustments in response to scope or design changes, ensuring projects remained within financial plans, maintaining budget adherence within 5%.
Analysed tendering documents and scopes, leading to precise quantity take-offs and accurate cost calculations for complex architectural and engineering projects, improving cost accuracy by 10%.
Facilitated scope clarifications and design follow-up, collaborating with architects and engineers to refine tender bids and align cost frameworks, reducing bid preparation time by 15%.
Outlined comprehensive BOQs and tender documents, integrating commercial and technical proposals including innovative construction methodologies, increasing proposal acceptance rate by 12%.
Engaged in cost estimating and consulting, providing financial insights to suppliers and subcontractors, enhancing project fiscal accuracy by 8%.
Successfully resolved disputes, drafting contracts and outlining site layouts to mitigate construction disagreements and streamline processes, reducing dispute resolution time by 20%.
Managed civil project quantity take-offs and developed robust BOQs, enhancing the accuracy of financial and feasibility studies for real estate acquisitions, improving study accuracy by 15%.

Conducted cost feasibility studies on preliminary designs, calculating comprehensive project budgets, and preparing financial programs for construction schedules, reducing budget preparation time by 10%.
Supervised onsite quantity take-offs across architectural, engineering, and MEP projects; provided procurement advice contributing to reduced financial deviations by 12%.
Supported tendering department with cost consulting and BOQ preparations, suggesting innovative solutions for tender stage optimization, improving tender success rate by 10%.
